sentences.english: Please everyone get off with me into this beautiful song wonders fog.
sentences.chinese: 请大家随我下车，走进这美丽的雾凇奇观。

sentences.english: Kit Kat Wizard of thousands of Rime, the simple and honest clumsy shrubs pure heaven.
sentences.chinese: 精灵奇巧的雾凇千姿百态，笨拙憨厚的灌木清纯天成。

sentences.english: Sometime there could be more than 60 times rime-formation in a single winter.
sentences.chinese: 有时一个冬天可以形成多于60次的雾凇。

sentences.english: Fog also a folk song in "Dream as" a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 雾凇在民间还有一个“梦送”的美名。

sentences.english: Usually, after nine o'clock in the morning, the rime will fell down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 通常，早晨九点钟后，雾凇会从树上脱落下来。

sentences.english: This is Wu Song, one of China 's four natural wonders – Jilin Rime.
sentences.chinese: 这就是名列中国四大自然奇观之一的吉林雾凇。

sentences.english: The most of soft rime and mixed icing appeared at about wind direction of NW.
sentences.chinese: 雾凇和雨雾凇在NW风向附近次数最多。

sentences.english: The most of soft rime and mixed icing appeared at about wind direction of NW.
sentences.chinese: 雾凇和雨雾凇在NW风向附近次数最多。

definition: frost/a patina of ice from freezing rain or water vapor
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
frost forming a pattern on a surface/rime
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
(of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
